name: Alien: Far from home
description:
GAMEPLAY & STORY You play as an alien whose spaceship was damaged and landed on the earth. Now some people known as Alien-Agents have found that you are roaming on the earth, so they are in search for you. When your spaceship was crashed it's important parts were scattered all around the Wellspring town. Now you have to find  and collect all the three parts (Engine, Exhaust and the Key) & take each one of them to the spaceship (one by one) in order to repair your spaceship and go back home. But the twist is that you can't breathe the air on earth for a long time, so you have to possess or control the souls of humans roaming in the town (Special ability) in order to survive, But you can't control a human for more than 15 seconds i.e. If you you control a same human for 15 seconds he will become mad and make chaos throughout the game. You have to switch between the humans throughout the game and beware of the Agents roaming around the city trying to catch you, they will not recognize you when you are a human so try to be a human in front of them! So "Let There be Chaos" but you have to go back home! HOW TO PLAY
  • Use Arrow Keys or w, a, s, d keys to move around in the world.
  • Press space-bar to possess an NPC when near.
  • Press Q to leave possession from a NPC.
